surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)

King Wu of Zhou, personal name Ji Fa, reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty 西周[Xi1 Zhou1] 1046-771 BC

sentences.english: One day, an ambassador from the Lu state in the west presented King Wu with a huge dog.
sentences.chinese: 一天，西方陆国的使臣向周武王进献了一条大狗。

sentences.english: Jifa, king Wu of Zhou Dynasty, was the first person known as the emperor in the history of China.
sentences.chinese: 周武王姬发是在中国历史上，第一个被称为天子的人。

sentences.english: Ruler of Zhou relied on force, so they invented and fully utilized all kinds of weapons.
sentences.chinese: 周武王用武力取天下，使用了各种各样的兵器。
